live_updates: The issues have been resolved and all services should be up and running. Thank you for your patience.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
59793.summary: Some customers in Sault Ste Marie are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
59793.title: Apr 5 - Sault Ste Marie | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
